description: Adds an item to the cache using a key-value pair
Adds a nested item to the cache using a fully qualified name, key and value
Retrieves an item from the cache using a key
Retrieves a nested item from the cache using a fully qualified name and key
Retrieves all values for a specific fully qualified name in the cache
Initializes the cache by creating a new empty HashMap
Removes an item from the cache using a key
Removes a nested item from the cache using a fully qualified name and key
